summary: THE STRAPS ON COSCO INFANT SEAT MODEL# 02-537-MBP TWIST EASILY.  THEY ARE VERY FLIMSY AND DO NOT STAY FLAT.  THE STRAP ESSENTIALLY BECOMES A ROPE.  I HAVE CONTACTED THE COMPANY, AND THEY SENT REPLACEMENT STRAPS BUT THEY BECAME TWISTED AFTER 2 USES.  THEY ARE NOW OFFERING ME A REFUND FOR THE SEAT.  I AM CONCERNED ABOUT THE ABILITY OF TWISTED STRAPS TO SPREAD OUT CRASH LOADS ON AN INFANT'S BODY.
